Text:
Thanx 4 the UL.

I'm not watching the series till i've got the whole 24 episodes :) coz when i've watched one episode I really want to see the next one straight away :)

God yeah, I agree with that but I just couldn't resist. My Mum said the same thing when I offered to bring them round to her house the other day. "have you got all 24" she said in hopeful tone she was almost upset when I said no just the 1st 5. Cheers eztv the 1st one was only shown in the UK on Sunday 31/1 I think.

I live in New Zealand, normally I would have to wait for like a whole year before they will air thing on TV. Not anymore, I can depend on this uploader, Ive downloaded all your 24's so far eztv. Keep it up.

And they wounder why people download TV episodes on the net... A whole year to wait, what a joke.
